titles: The unsatisfied lovers lamentation. This hapless lass in discontent laments and makes her moan, & is with sorrow almost spent, because she lies alone. Tune of, Hey boys up go we.
publisher: Printed for, J. Wright J. Clark W. Thackery, and T. Passenger.,
notes: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "This twenty years and more that I ..."
